snippet: Calming investors were reassurances from the new Fed chairwoman that rates would need to remain low for some time.
abstract: Stock market rises, notching slight gains for March and first quarter of 2014, after Federal Reserve chairwoman Janet L Yellen assures investors that short-term interest rates will remain low for some time.
lead_paragraph: Calming investors were reassurances from the new Fed chairwoman that rates would need to remain low for some time.

headline.main: Market Notches Slight Gains for the Month and the First Quarter
headline.print_headline: Market Notches Slight Gains for the Month and the First Quarter
